title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 174.8 - Military installation decals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 174.8 - Military installation decals

State Regulations

The commanding officer of any base, fort, arsenal, reservation or other installation operated by the Armed Forces of the United

States may authorize a decal or set of decals to be affixed to the top center
of the windshield of any vehicle operating on such facility. No part of the
decal or set of decals may extend more than six inches below the top of the
windshield. The decal or set of decals may not exceed in size a rectangle
approximately four inches wide by two inches high. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
174.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
